name: 金融时报
description: 专业财经媒体风格，衬线字体

styles.container: max-width: 680px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 16px 20px 40px 20px; font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif; font-size: 17px; line-height: 1.75 !important; color: #33302e !important; background-color: #fff1e5 !important; word-wrap: break-word;

h1.base: font-size: 38px; font-weight: 600; color: #000 !important; line-height: 1.2 !important; margin: 56px 0 24px; font-family: Georgia, serif; letter-spacing: -0.01em; border-bottom: 4px solid #990f3d; padding-bottom: 16px;

h2.base: font-size: 30px; font-weight: 600; color: #990f3d !important; line-height: 1.3 !important; margin: 48px 0 20px; font-family: Georgia, serif; border-left: 6px solid #990f3d; padding-left: 20px;

h3.base: font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; color: #33302e !important; line-height: 1.4 !important; margin: 40px 0 16px; font-family: Georgia, serif; border-bottom: 2px solid #cec6b9; padding-bottom: 8px;

base.base: font-size: 20px; font-weight: 600; color: #33302e !important; line-height: 1.5 !important; margin: 32px 0 12px; font-family: Georgia, serif;

code.block: margin: 28px 0; padding: 24px; background-color: #fff !important; border-left: 4px solid #990f3d; overflow-x: auto; line-height: 1.6 !important;
code.inline: font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace; font-size: 15px; padding: 3px 8px; background-color: #fff !important; color: #990f3d !important; border: 1px solid #cec6b9; font-weight: 600;

styles.quote: margin: 24px 0; padding: 14px 20px; background-color: #fff1e5 !important; color: #990f3d !important; font-size: 17px; line-height: 1.6 !important; font-style: italic; font-family: Georgia, serif; border-left: 6px solid #990f3d; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(153, 15, 61, 0.1);
styles.image: max-width: 100%; max-height: 600px !important; height: auto; display: block; margin: 32px auto; border: 3px solid #990f3d;
styles.link: color: #0d7680 !important; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 2px solid #0d7680; font-weight: 600;

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 32px 0; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 16px; background-color: #fff !important;
table.header: background-color: #990f3d !important; color: #fff !important; padding: 14px 16px; text-align: left; border: 1px solid #990f3d; font-weight: 700; font-family: Georgia, serif;

styles.hr: margin: 48px auto; border: none; height: 2px; background-color: #990f3d !important; max-width: 80px;
